content: this easy crop top is created entirely in single_crochet i love that the dense stitches give complete coverage so the design is more modest as far as crochet crop tops go i ve included instructions for general sizes xs s m l xl but i ve added notes describing how you can measure yourself and alter this pattern for the perfect fit for you this crochet crop top can also be finished 3 different ways to create different necklines - square neck ruched and a sweetheart neckline slightly_smiling_face there is also a video tutorial check out more free crochet patterns here 1 sign up to my ** newsletter 2 ** and never miss a new crochet pattern release 1 https //forthefrills com 2 https //view flodesk com/pages/5ebf67c2ab499000265d1ad4
